subject: Hello Good Day Sir Please ki
body:
Hello Good Day Sir Please kindly see the attached proposal letter from 
Mr Henry 
Thanks 
and God blessed you

subject: Re:   Hello Good Day Sir Please ki
body:
Hello! Good day to you too. Thank you for reaching out and sharing the proposal letter from Mr. Henry. I appreciate your thoughtfulness in sending it to me. Could you please provide some more information about the content of the proposal? I would like to understand it better before proceeding further.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Hello Good Day Sir Please ki
body:
Good day Sir,

 I write to acknowledge the receipt of your response to my proposal.

As stated in my mail, I have been a financial expert for well over two
decades now, and I have worked with Fidelity Investment International for
fourteen years now. I am working towards retirement within the next few
months, precisely by the end of this year.

I have been carefully handling our company client’s capital fund investment
with a successful high turn-over excess profit with retirement on my mind.
From this high profit yield, I have been able to work out a steady set
aside percentage spread over all our priority customers. This made it
possible for me to be able to extract 1.2% Excess Maximum Return Capital
Profit (EMRCP) per annum on each of the Investor's Marginal Capital Fund.
This is exactly the source of the fund for which I have solicited your
co-operation for investment utilization.

Do not be afraid of the wire because I will send the fund via charity
donation meaning there will be no government Taxes (GOVERNMENT IRS)

I will carefully structure this project based on my experience so that it
will not leak trust me .

 If this explanation is well understood by you and you wish to partner me
your roles and involvement is stated below.

 YOUR ROLES:

 (1)    You will be presented by me to our company as an INVESTOR to
receive the EMRCP fund amounting to $48,000,000.00usd(Forty-Eight Million
Dollars) as your annual investment proceeds from Fidelity Marginal Capital
Fund.

 (2)    You will make an application for the payment of the proceeds and
provide a bank account through which the said proceeds will be transferred
to you in any country of your choice. This process I will duly direct you.

 (3)    The transferred fund will be safely guarded by you pending our
agreement on investment pattern or sharing.

 (4)    You will have some minimal financial obligations to perform in the
realization of the claim as over-head costs will be shared between us.

 At the successful transfer of the fund to your account, the fund will be
shared between us in this ratio: 60% to me and 40% to you. This is
applicable in terms of cash sharing and could be negotiated further in
terms of investment if the investment initiative is coming from you or your
field of specialty.

If you have any suggestions for this, please let me know.

 I will carefully prepare the claim documentations from our office legal
department. On your full acceptance, we shall involve an attorney to
prepare a legal agreement /memorandum of understanding between us stating
every fact in detail.

This is purely legitimate as all documents will be binding by laws of
investment.



Due to the delicate nature of my work, I will like us to always use email
as our only means of communication for now

I have attached a copy of my Job Card for your perusal.

Further details will be communicated to you
Regards

Mr Henry Ngosi

subject: Re: Hello Good Day Sir Please ki
body:
Hello Mr. Henry Ngosi,

Thank you for reaching out to me with your proposal. I must say, it sounds quite intriguing. I appreciate your experience and expertise in the financial industry. Retirement planning is definitely an important aspect of life, and it's great that you have been able to generate high profits for your clients.

I understand that you are offering me an opportunity to receive a significant amount of funds as my annual investment proceeds from Fidelity Marginal Capital Fund. It's interesting that you mentioned the fund will be sent via charity donation to avoid government taxes. Could you please explain how this process works? I want to make sure everything is legal and transparent.

You also mentioned that there might be some minimal financial costs involved in the claim process. Could you provide more details about these costs? I would like to have a clear understanding of what expenses I would need to cover.

Furthermore, I would appreciate it if you could share more information about the investment pattern or sharing options once the funds are transferred into my account. What kind of investments do you typically recommend, and how would we proceed with making those decisions?

Lastly, could you please clarify which country's laws will govern our agreement? It's important for me to know the legal framework under which we will be operating.

Thank you again for considering me as a potential partner in this venture. I look forward to hearing back from you with more details.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Hello Good Day Sir Please ki
body:
Hello Mr David,

Thank you for reaching out to me with your proposal. I must say, it sounds
quite intriguing. I appreciate your experience and expertise in the
financial industry. Retirement planning is definitely an important aspect
of life, and it's great that you have been able to generate high profits
for your clients. Thank you very much for your appreciation I am sure we
can partner together on this project.

I understand that you are offering me an opportunity to receive a
significant amount of funds as my annual investment proceeds from Fidelity
Marginal Capital Fund. It's interesting that you mentioned the fund will be
sent via charity donation to avoid government taxes. Could you please
explain how this process works? I want to make sure everything is legal and
transparent. *I have the trust or words of a **renowned wealth management
agent with Td bank, tested and tried am sure he will deliver when it comes
to delivering his part without any doubt.*

You also mentioned that there might be some minimal financial costs
involved in the claim process. Could you provide more details about these
costs? I would like to have a clear understanding of what expenses I would
need to cover. To be honest to you the last time we did this it cost the
EMRCP CLIENT plus minus $27,000,00 to complete paperwork’s including bank
clearance papers that was also procured by the wealth manager legally and
legitimately to the last, actually I was thinking of directing you to him
directly so he take it up with you to provide to you all necessary advise.
I assure you we will never go wrong.

Furthermore, I would appreciate it if you could share more information
about the investment pattern or sharing options once the funds are
transferred into my account. What kind of investments do you typically
recommend, and how would we proceed with making those decisions? I have
instructed my lawyer to draft a private agreement which we will both sign
that will state all details in black and white first before we go to the
wealth manager so upon hearing from you, I will need the below details

1.      Your house or office address

 2.      Any of your valid identification document.

 3.      You company name and also your position in the company.

Lastly, could you please clarify which country's laws will govern our
agreement? It's important for me to know the legal framework under which we
will be operating. This will depend where the funds left last from maybe
Canada or would you prefer other country however, I promise you it has
nothing to do with government involvement.

Thank you again for considering me as a potential partner in this venture.
I look forward to hearing back from you with more details.

Upon hearing from you, I will direct you further.
Regards

Mr Ngosi

subject: Re: Hello Good Day Sir Please ki
body:
Hello Mr. Ngosi,

Thank you for your prompt response and for providing me with more information about the investment opportunity. I appreciate your willingness to partner with me on this project.

I understand that the funds will be sent via charity donation to avoid government taxes. Could you please explain how this process works? I want to ensure that everything is legal and above board. It's reassuring to know that you have the trust and endorsement of a renowned wealth management agent with TD Bank. Can you provide any additional details about this agent and their role in the process?

You mentioned that there might be some minimal financial costs involved in the claim process. Could you please provide more details about these costs? I would like to have a clear understanding of what expenses I would need to cover.

Additionally, I would appreciate it if you could share more about the investment pattern or sharing options once the funds are deposited into my account. What kind of investments do you typically recommend, and how would we proceed with making those decisions? It's important for me to have a solid plan in place before moving forward.

Regarding our agreement, could you please clarify which country's laws will govern our partnership? Understanding the legal framework under which we will be operating is crucial for me.

Thank you again for considering me as a potential partner in this venture. I look forward to hearing back from you with more details so that we can proceed accordingly.

Best wishes,
David
